pullRequest.bodyText:
7.x client can pass media type with a version which will return a 7.x

relates #51816

commit.message:
Allow passing versioned media types to 7.x server

7.x client can pass media type with a version which will return a 7.x
version of the api in ES 8.
In ES server 7 this media type shoulld be accepted but it serve the same
version of the API (7x)

nodes.bodyText: I would suggest to wrap this in if(mediaType.contains("vnd.elasticsearch"){ ...} else return mediaType.  It is a micro-optimization, but will probably save a few CPU cycles. Also I think you can collapse the two replaceAll into a single line.
